title: Addresses
subtitle: Here you can manage addresses and receive the notifications sent to you by institutions registered with SEND.

legal-contacts.title: Legal address
legal-contacts.pec-description: When an institution sends a communication for you on SEND, you will receive the official notification at the PEC you selected.
legal-contacts.pec-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated PEC address. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
legal-contacts.pec-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct PEC or <0>generate a new code</0>.
legal-contacts.remove-pec-message: Are you sure you want to remove the PEC address {{value}}?
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-title: Do you want to cancel the verification?
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-content: If you cancel the verification, you will need to enter a new PEC address and restart the process.
legal-contacts.validation-progress-content: We are verifying that the PEC address is valid. You will receive an email with the result within 24 hours.
legal-contacts.sercq_send-description: It is like a physical domicile, but online. If you select SEND as a digital domicile, you will receive notifications from the institutions that are registered with the platform in real time and you can consult them anywhere.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-title: Activate SEND as your Digital Domicile
legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-description: If you activate the Digital Domicile, SEND will become your legal address for PA communications.

sercq-send-info-list.title: 100% digital notifications
sercq-send-info-list.description: You will no longer receive paper notifications.

sercq-send-info-list.title: No notification cost
sercq-send-info-list.description: You no longer have to worry about collecting paper documents and paying the relative costs.

sercq-send-info-list.title: Everything in one place
sercq-send-info-list.description: The notifications that institutions send you via SEND will always be delivered to your Digital Domicile and be available in your reserved area.

legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-tos: By pressing “Activate” you declare to have read and accepted the <0>Terms of service</0>.
legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-title: Do you confirm to want to deactivate the Digital Domicile on SEND?
legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-message: You will no longer have a legal digital address for the communications of the Public Administration and can return to receiving paper copies of the notifications.
legal-contacts.block-remove-digital-domicile-title: It is not possible to deactivate the Digital Domicile
legal-contacts.sercq-send-io-description: Activate SEND - Notifiche Digitali on IO to receive the communications sent directly to your SEND digital domicile directly in app.

io-contact.title: IO app
io-contact.description: Read and manage legal communications directly on IO: when there is a notification for you, you will receive it in app and you can pay any expenses.

disable-modal.title: Do you want to deactivate the "Notifiche Digitali" service on IO?
disable-modal.content: When you receive a notification, you will no longer receive an in-app message.

courtesy-contacts.email-filled-description: When there is a notification for you, we will inform you with an email to the address you selected.
courtesy-contacts.sms-description: When there is a notification for you, we will inform you with an SMS to the number you selected.
courtesy-contacts.email-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the email address indicated. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.sms-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated mobile number. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.email-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct email or <0>generate a new code</0>.
courtesy-contacts.sms-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct mobile number or <0>generate a new code</0>.
courtesy-contacts.valid-email: The email address is not valid
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-message: Are you sure you want to remove the email address {{value}}?
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message: Are you sure you want to remove the mobile number {{value}}?

special-contacts.contact-to-add-description: Associate an address with a specific institution to customize the communications you receive based on the sender.
special-contacts.contact-already-exists: The selected institution is already associated with this address. If you press "Associate", it will be replaced by the one you indicated here.
special-contacts.fetch-party-error: We were unable to retrieve the data needed to create a new address.
special-contacts.modal-title: Customize the address associated with an institution
special-contacts.remove-special-description: The notifications related to the notifications of the associated institutions will no longer be sent to this address, but to the main one.

common.duplicate-contact-descr: A contact {{value}} is already present, do you still want to proceed?

invalid_verification_code.title: Wrong code
invalid_verification_code.message: Check and re-enter it, or generate another one.

retry_limit_code.title: You have made too many attempts
retry_limit_code.message: You have entered the wrong code too many times. To try again, press "Cancel", make sure the contact is correct and enter the new code.

expired_verification_code.title: This code has expired
expired_verification_code.message: Generate a new one and enter it.

domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-title: No more paper documents: activate SEND as a Digital Domicile
domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-description: Select the SEND platform as a Digital Domicile to receive the next notifications only digitally and to read them in real time, from anywhere.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-description: Without a courtesy address, we cannot inform you when there is a legal communication to read on SEND.
domicile-banner.no-io-description: When there is a notification for you, you can receive it on the IO app, read it and pay any expenses directly in app!
domicile-banner.add-io: Activate SEND on the IO app
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-title: Do you want to receive the next notifications only digitally?
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-description: Activate SEND as the Digital Domicile and stop worrying about registered mail.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-no-sercq-send-description: Add an email address to receive a notification when you have a new notification on SEND.
